name: University of Virginia
subtitle: B.S. Computer Science
description: I am a rising second year engineering student pursuing a B.S. in computer science with a potential second major in statistics and a focus in psychology. I have taken Program and Data Representation, Discrete Math, Linear Algebra, and Calculus-based Probability and will be taking graduate-level Machine Learning, Theory of Computation, Computer Architecture, and two statistics courses. My main languages are Java, Python, C++, and Javascript.
